thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn San Francisco Airport North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South San Francisco, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great find!!
thread.title_full: Great find!! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn San Francisco Airport North, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: jose l
title: Great find!!
text: I love hotels that are recently remodeled. This property was recently remodeled and it looks great. I stayed in room 601. The hotel is near SF international airport and offers a complimentary shuttle. Everything is new and clean. Upon checkin and checkout the staff was very accommodating. My only observation was the breakfast is a little disorganized. You order at the cook station but your meal never arrives at the table. The cooks are lost in translation. One speaks Spanish and the other Cantonese.
